Effect: Fires a controllable (by selecting the "arrows" underneath it and giving it movement orders) magnetic beam that reduces the speed of units vulnerable to magnetic weapons in a radius of 4 by 70% and immobilizes them if they are right at its center
The effect takes 20 frames (1.3 in-game seconds) to apply and lingers for 40 frames (2.7 in-game seconds)
The magnetic beam moves at a speed of 32 (flying) and lasts for 720 frames (48 in-game seconds)
